item.description:
Dear Members,

Since our sugested December meetup falls right smack in the middle of the busiest week for The Meadows, I am going to skip December and schedule our next meet for January 8th, from 2-4 pm, at the Meadows.  In the meanwhile, if there is another warm day forecast for a Sunday, I might have a short notice  outdoor meet in Newton at the beautiful conservation area that we met in September.  I will do this whenever I can because I know so many of you have requested outdoor meets.  But in the meanwhile, we will continue meeting at the Meadows.

Also, I am reinstating the no-charge policy we had a year ago since so many of us have been hit hard by the problems of the US economy.  But I will continue to ask everyone who can do so to bring a folding chair to the meetups.

I apologize for not attending this past Sunday's meetup.  I am experiencing back spasms from having worked on moving 10 rooms worth of furniture, possessions etc. a couple of weeks ago, with the help of friends.  I guess I overdid it, thinking that i am still 25 years old, which is not true!

 

Small dog hugs,

Kim

group.name: The Boston Maltese and Tiny Dog Meetup Group

item.name: BOSTON MALTESE & TINY DOG MEET SUNDAY Jan. 8th, Sunday, 2-4pm
